name: Puzzle Charge
description:
A new puzzle game like no other: Puzzle Charge! Free for a limited time!

Explore a vast world, collect pets and solve ancient puzzles in this classic match 3 puzzle game. Each pet has a unique power to help you along the way; try to find as many different pets as possible!

Features

• Simple to pickup, difficult to master!

• Many cute pets to find each with their own unique powers!

• A huge world to explore

• Unique puzzles like no other!

Install now for free!
